greeting.se_osb_not_found:
Welcome to Advanced Chat by Degranon!

It requires the StarExtensions version 1.9.24+ or OpenStarbound 0.1.8+
https://github.com/StarExtensions/StarExtensions
https://github.com/OpenStarbound/OpenStarbound
greeting.se_version:
Welcome to Advanced Chat by Degranon!

Please update the StarExtensions to version 1.9.24+
greeting.osb_version:
Welcome to Advanced Chat by Degranon!

Please update the OpenStarbound to version 0.1.8+
https://github.com/OpenStarbound/OpenStarbound
greeting.unbind_controls:
Welcome to Advanced Chat by Degranon!

To begin with, you need to manually unbound the following controls (Press Escape - Options - Controls - Game):

* Begin Chat Command
* Begin Chat
* Repeat Last Command ^gray;(for that user /binds - Repeat last command)^reset;

Click Accept, rejoin the game - and you should be good to go!
